banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: "Kilamu" / "Ama Aje" / "Jam Now, Simmer Down" / "Dracula"

nodes.whyListen: Blinky Bill Sellanga is a producer, DJ and the frontman of the musical collective Just A Band, which mixes genres like hip hop, electronica and funk to make music for popular radio and to give voice to Kenyan youth.

videoData.description: With dynamic energy and infectious beats, TED Fellow "Blinky" Bill Sellanga delivers an uplifting performance of four songs.
videoData.socialDescription: With dynamic energy and infectious beats, TED Fellow "Blinky" Bill Sellanga delivers an uplifting performance of four songs.
